attributes.additional_details: The aim of our campaign is to get 10 young people from all around England to meet with politicians in the House of Commons once a month in order to debate issues concerning young people.

rejection.details:
Please see e-petition created by Zak Green, closing on 21/11/2014

''There should be a young group, aged 14+ to be selected from their schools to form a group that can meet with the government on a regular basis to discuss matters that are close to them. Surely we can't deny young people beginning to understand the government and it's decisions?''
